Text: Ah so are 3 day weeks the norm now? I am not familiar with Howards new contract agreement.
Howard will do a 3 day week every other week from here on out.

He's cut his days down because Sirius offered him less money and Howard couldn't swallow a little pride and accept it without making it to where he was being paid the same on a per show basis. The loser here, unfortunately, is the listener. Howard should have made a little sacrifice for the benefit of his fans. Many of which have had to make a huge sacrifice due to the terrible state of the economy. I'm a huge Stern fan but this does upset and annoy me.

@transfixed32

Some sacrifice you're making downloading Howard's show for free.
I'd pay for it if it was available in europe. Is there a legitimate pay site to download from?
